prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with a fluffy appearance and a bright red crest on its head.
I want a small, feisty Pokemon that resembles a young eagle with striking yellow feathers.
Generate a playful Pokemon that has a mix of yellow and purple colors and big, curious eyes.
Make a Pokemon with a cheerful personality, featuring wing-like arms and a cute, round body.
Imagine a Pokemon that can be found in grassy areas, with a design that emphasizes its avian traits.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of adventure, with a vibrant color palette and energetic stance.
